REDIS_COMMANDS_PROCESSED.description: Total number of commands processed by the server

REDIS_CONNECTED_CLIENTS.description: Number of client connections (excluding connections from slaves)

REDIS_CONNECTIONS_RECEIVED.description: Total number of connections accepted by the server

REDIS_KEYS_EXPIRED.description: Total number of key expiration events

REDIS_KEY_EVICTIONS.description: Number of evicted keys due to maxmemory limit

REDIS_KEY_HITS.description: Number of successful lookup of keys in the main dictionary

REDIS_KEY_MISSES.description: Number of failed lookup of keys in the main dictionary

REDIS_USED_MEMORY.description: Percentage of server memory used for the Redis instance
